fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Profiled: The King is not Outsider aligned if you spawn. They also do not have an Advisor. 
- Rivalry: If you are in the same Room with the King, you will deal them 2 HP of Unblockable damage at the end of the phase. You may choose to not have this activated. 
- Suspicious: If you have not Killed the King by Night 3, your existence will be revealed to them. They will also gain a (Satcheled) card of their choice. [Activates D4]

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Track: Follow the King to the Room they visit this Night phase, even if they visit Kingâ€™s Quarters. [2 uses]
- Backup: Draw 2 extra cards immediately. [3 uses, 1 CD]
- Prepared: Upgrade a card in your Hand. [1 use, Unique, Unlocks D2]
- STANDOFF: Put the King and yourself into any non-Role Specific Room of your choice the following Night phase. They will be unable to enter any other Room. [1 use, Unique, Day-Only, Unlocks D2]

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to Kill the King before Day 5. You will then become the King, assuming the opposite aligned role of the previous King with full abilities. You will still win regardless of your new alignment.
